org.dotplot.eclipse.views
Class DotPlotNavigator

java.lang.Object
  org.eclipse.ui.part.WorkbenchPart
      org.eclipse.ui.part.ViewPart
          org.dotplot.eclipse.views.DotPlotNavigator
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.eclipse.core.runtime.IAdaptable, org.eclipse.core.runtime.IExecutableExtension, org.eclipse.jface.viewers.ICheckStateListener, org.eclipse.ui.IPersistable, org.eclipse.ui.IViewPart, org.eclipse.ui.IWorkbenchPart, org.eclipse.ui.IWorkbenchPart2, org.eclipse.ui.part.IWorkbenchPartOrientation
public class DotPlotNavigator
extends org.eclipse.ui.part.ViewPart
implements org.eclipse.jface.viewers.ICheckStateListener

DotPlotNavigator allows navigating your file-system and to choose files to plot.

Author:
Sascha Hemminger & Roland Helmrich
See Also:
ViewPart

getFileSystemRoot

private java.io.File getFileSystemRoot()
Will return the root File for the file system. On Windows, there are more than one root, in this case, a special File will be returned that provides access to all Windows-"drives".

Returns:
the file system root(s)

getFileList

public ISourceList getFileList()
getFileList creates a IFileList from the selected elements.

Returns:
an IFileList with files from the chosen viewer
